welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lopik, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and has a wide range of amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to low-cost carriers and has a more basic selection of facilities.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
